frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-add-userhost-to-panel
frozen.shortDescription: Adds user@host to the top panel, in the center to the right of the clock.
frozen.longDescription:
Adds user@host to the top panel, in the center to the right of the clock.

Nothing fancy, no support -- fork at will, the thing is very simple.
